abstract: Stocks drop as shares of mining and materials companies sink.

headline.print_headline: Wall St. Drops on Drug Makers’ Slide

snippet: Mining and energy stocks, like Newmont Mining and Range Resources, were among the decliners as prices for metals and crude oil fell....
lead_paragraph: Mining and energy stocks, like Newmont Mining and Range Resources, were among the decliners as prices for metals and crude oil fell.
